colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006B (CES GZUNGS GZHUG GNOD SBYIN 'KHOR LO JI LTAR BYA BA'I TSUL GSAL BYED NOR BU'I ME LONG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SNGA DUS NAS DAM PA MANG POS, ,GNOD SBYIN 'KHOR @007A *, ,LO BYA TSUL LA LUGS SO SO SNANG MUN LTAR 'GAL BA MANG DU 'DUG CING, DE LA BRTEN PA'I DAG MA DAG BYUNG TSE DGE SKYON YANG SHIN TU CHE BA 'PHRAL DU YONG 'DUG PAS, ,JI LTAR BYA BA'I TSUL GSAL BA ZHIG GYIS CIG CES GSUNG BA BYUNG YANG, ,BTANG SNYOMS SU LUS, ,PHYIS GZIMS KHANG GONG SPRUL PA'I SKU GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN DANG, ,DE MO SPRUL PA'I SKU NGAG DBANG DGE LEGS RGYAL MTSAN GYI GSUNG GIS NAN GYIS BSKUL ZHING, RJE DRUNG BLO BZANG DBANG RGYAL GNYIS KYIS KYANG, ,YANG YANG GSOL BA BTAB PA LA BRTEN NAS, ,RIGS PAR SMRA BA'I RGYAL KHAMS PA BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYI GSUNG GIS NAN GYIS BSKUL ZHING, RJE DRUNG BLO BZANG DBANG RGYAL GNYIS KYIS KYANG, YANG YANG GSOL BA BTAB PA LA BRTEN NAS, ,RIGS PAR SMRA BA'I RGYAL KHAMS PA BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS, ,DGAG BSGRUB KYI SPROS PA DOR NAS, ,JI LTAR BYA BA'I LAG LEN SNYING POR DRIL TE, ,CHOS GRVA CHEN PO BKRA SHIS LHUN PO'I GZIMS KHANG RGYAL MTSAN MTHON PO'I GZIMS CHUNG YID DGA' CHOS 'DZIN DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA YANG RJE DRUNG BLO BZANG DBANG RGYAL LO, ,MANGGA LAm, ,AOm SVA STI, PHAN BDE'I 'BYUNG GNAS RGYAL BSTAN YONGS 'DU'I LJON, ,RAB RGYAS 'GRO KUN THANG MCHOG 'BRAS BZANG LA, ,SPYOD PHYIR BKRA SHIS LHUN GRUB CHOS GRVA CHER, ,CHOS SBYIN 'DZAD MED DAL 'BYOR 'GRO'I RGYUN 'DI SPEL, ,SARBA DZA GA TAm,, ,,)
